name: Ascended Sample: Queen
description: A rare sample resulting from the alchemical activation of a substance.  The "Queen" was once known as the "Minister," but as the rules of the gameevolved, it grew to become the most powerful piece and a representation of theauthority of the family behind the throne — a true symbol of gilded royalty.  Perhaps the promotion of an ordinary foot soldier shares some similaritieswith the transmutation of matter, yet even should they manage to turn to gold,the most a pawn might hope for is to be represented by an upturned rook.
